summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4415 for the improvement of West 60th Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to Seaview Avenue; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52162, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
